name: Wrath Of The Fire God
description: Wrath of the Fire God is a fast-paced VR action shooter. Venture down into the realm of the Fire God using your archery skills to retrieve the 4 magical gems stolen from your village.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Intel Core i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 equivalent or higher Storage: 1 GB available space
